item.title: Big Ideas of Web Development!?
item.description:
Website is just so interesting and important to the world nowadays, and I believe it is becoming more and more interesting and important every second.

So let’s talk about my understanding of web development; I want to explain the fundamental concepts in my way, Eldon’s way so that someone without experience would understand :p

item.title: Who am I ?
item.description: Nice to meet you! Do you want to know more about me?

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: Thank you so much for visiting my blog, I will take my time to write more posts and at the same time do well at school and work. Everything here is just my thoughts; all my posts may contain mistakes because I am constantly learning (lol I am still young). If you have any questions, feel free to send me email. I promise I will reply as soon as I can.
